hypothesis_content.title: Intraday VWAP Reversion with Volume Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC price deviates >2.5% from its intraday VWAP on 1-hour timeframe with declining volume on the move, it will revert to within 1% of VWAP within 6 hours with >68% probability in NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: VWAP represents average traded price. Large deviations with fading volume suggest lack of conviction, prompting market makers and algos to fade the move, especially in non-trending regimes.
entry_conditions: BTC price >2.5% away from current session VWAP (calculated from 00:00 UTC)
Volume on last 3 hourly bars shows declining trend (each bar < previous)
RSI(14) on 1h > 65 for downside reversion or < 35 for upside reversion

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 1% of VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends to >4% deviation from VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate <68% in neutral/bear regimes, or average time to reversion >8 hours when profitable.
